task.title: How to start the Calculator app?
task.shortdesc: Here you will the information on how to start the calculator app on your smartphone.

prereq.p: To use the Calculator app, you need to unlock the phone first

context.p: You can use the Calculator app on your smartphone. You will find it useful when you need to quickly calculate some numbers.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Calculator application icon.

result.p: You are now ready to calcute with it.

taskbody.example: For instance, if you have purchased a book for 15 and you've given $10, how much change you should expect? Answer is 10-5=5, $5 change.
